Is hyperparathyroidism-jaw tumor syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,hyperparathyroidism-jaw tumor syndrome
